title: Designing Future Technology-Based Mathematics Curriculum: A Constructivist Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic mathematics education and elementary understanding of digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Constructivist project-based learning activities focused on enabling pre-service teachers to design math education utilizing future technologies in real classroom environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute at least three mathematics problem-solving projects linked to future technologies (digital automation, sustainability-related technologies)
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers using a constructivist approach to develop at least two VR/simulation-based mathematics education scenarios
Learners can propose at least five creative mathematics learning activities under technological environmental constraints (smartphone-based)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
